EmailTemplate.subject: Recording Now Available: Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We missed you "Using Fusion with VisiCAD" Webinar
Sorry that you were unable to join us for our recent webinar "Using Fusion ePCR with VisiCAD." If you would like to view the webinar or share the information with someone else, please reference the links below for the recording and the datasheet:
Webinar Recording Link>> Fusion ePCR Datasheet link >> Fusion ePCR 6.2 New Features Datasheet Link >>
For more information, contact your Client Account Manager
Michele Duwe michele.duwe@tritech.com
Brenda Taylor brenda.taylor@tritech.com
